name: Backstage Pass (itch) (FourBlockArmy)
description:
Beetholomew the Bee-Headed works as an understudy for a famous platforming protagonist, but he just wants to go back home to eat his honeycake! Go through holes in the wall to travel back and forth between the stage and the backstage!

WASD or Arrows to move

Shift to sprint

W or Up while touching wall or ceiling to wall/ ceiling climb

Good Luck!
